subject: Doping (Sports)
Drugs (Pharmaceuticals)
Sentences (Criminal)
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Mary Anne Catalano will be sentenced Monday in United States District Court. Her trove of detailed patient information should help authorities determine which athletes received drugs and treatment.
snippet: Mary Anne Catalano will be sentenced Monday in United States District Court. Her trove of detailed patient information should help authorities determine which athletes received drugs and treatment.
